title: Effects of copper on chemical kinetics and brown carbon formation in the aqueous Ë™OH oxidation of phenolic compounds
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,1526-1542
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00191E, Paper
Junwei Yang, Tianye Zhou, Yuting Lyu, Brix Raphael Go, Jason Chun-Ho Lam, Chak K. Chan, Theodora Nah
Many phenolic compounds (PhCs) can partition into atmospheric aqueous phases (e.g., cloud/fog water and aqueous aerosols) and react to form secondary organic aerosols (SOAs) and brown carbon (BrC).
